summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2528, for the improvement of 29th Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks upon the west side of the street, between East 55th Street and the north line of Shay's Addition to the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 29410 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
